stories.text:
The personal computer industry gained from basic research done at Xerox PARC in the 1970s. Wondering if we have a parallel for that today.

I'm interested to learn about basic research being done at tech giants and promising results that have been produced.
stories.title: Ask HN: What kind of basic research goes on at tech giants?
The Art of PostgreSQL: a modern PostgreSQL book in 2020
Tesla FSD Beta 9 Month Improvement Comparison Video
Apple will reportedly scan photos stored on iPhones for child abuse imagery

stories.text:
I am trying to develop a VR application that will show students the effect of releasing water in space. Is there a programming library that will help simulate that effect? Or is there any literature available on the algorithm or maths for achieving that?

I am trying to achieve the effect shown in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H_qPWZbxFl8
stories.title: Is there a CFD library available to simulate water floating in space?
